/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. In the distance, a large green dome stands out, adding a unique architectural feature to the cityscape. The image is captured from a low angle, emphasizing the grandeur of the buildings and the expansive sky.
